42e91fe4cf4cc928b638ef1be40237e9 (02:03): This worked: DELETE `gifts`, `people_gifts` FROM `gifts` JOIN `people_gifts` ON (`gifts`.`id` = `people_gifts`.`gid`) WHERE `gifts`.`id`=290

7bc4612b85b735fc8a53dec7bfa551db (02:04): (minus the join part)

7bc4612b85b735fc8a53dec7bfa551db (02:10): you are using a crappy shared server
56f0be566c645c9296a1c4c185e45471 (02:11): maybe it is my host who has db probs?
7bc4612b85b735fc8a53dec7bfa551db (02:11): you're probably on a $10 shared shell account?  if so, yeah.  overloaded

7bc4612b85b735fc8a53dec7bfa551db (02:12): the db name is unique

4d6fad18f5905dd3f0489d69385c7be8 (02:23): The company was founded in Sweden by two Swedes and a Finn: David Axmark, Allan Larsson and Michael "Monty" Widenius who have worked together since the 80's. MySQL AB is the sole owner of the MySQL server source code, the MySQL trademark and the mysql.com domain worldwide. The company is privately held and without debt, and it is financed by venture capital since July 2001.
